:''For other uses, see [[Love (disambiguation)]].''
    −
[[Image:Crystal Clear app package favourite.png|thumb|250px|A drawn [[heart]] is a international icon of love.]]
+
[[Image:Crystal Clear app package favourite.png|thumb|A drawn [[heart]] is an international icon of love]]
     
'''Love''' represents a range of [[emotion]]s and experiences related to the senses of [[affection]] and [[sexual attraction]].<ref name="oxford">''Oxford Illustrated American Dictionary'' (1998) + ''Merriam-Webster Collegiate Dictionary'' (2000).</ref> The word love can refer to a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes, ranging from generic [[pleasure]] to intense [[interpersonal attraction]]. This diversity of meanings, combined with the complexity of the feelings involved, makes love unusually difficult to consistently define, even compared to other emotional states.
 
'''Love''' represents a range of [[emotion]]s and experiences related to the senses of [[affection]] and [[sexual attraction]].<ref name="oxford">''Oxford Illustrated American Dictionary'' (1998) + ''Merriam-Webster Collegiate Dictionary'' (2000).</ref> The word love can refer to a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes, ranging from generic [[pleasure]] to intense [[interpersonal attraction]]. This diversity of meanings, combined with the complexity of the feelings involved, makes love unusually difficult to consistently define, even compared to other emotional states.
